text: Dr Eileen is so kind, knowledgeable and experienced! She always has a solution for my issues and they always work too! Thank you so much for seeing me when I have an emergency even though you are fully booked Dr Eileen! Special thanks to her staff at reception, especially Rani. I always feel taken care of by Dr Eileen and her staff!

Dr Eileen Tan is a wonderful doctor and very detailed. She’s patient and addresses one’s queries adequately.

edit: Her counter staff are also attentive to patients' needs and will even inform us when the expiry date is approaching to help us make a more informed decision before we purchase. Appreciate the service.

What a joke this clinic is. I visited two years ago for a hair fall problem that I only experience in Singapore (when I went back home, my hair stopped falling and started growing again). I asked my Singaporean husband to call the clinic to check if I could buy their scalp protector again without having to pay for a doctor’s consultation ($250+), and they said yes.

However, when I went there today, they refused to sell it to me unless I saw the doctor ($250+). Funny how it was okay over the phone when they assumed I was Singaporean, but once they saw I was Caucasian, suddenly I had to pay extra. Sadly, this isn’t the first time I’ve experienced this kind of treatment in Singapore.

It was a scalp protector sold for 75$+.

I have been a patient of Dr Eileen Tan since Oct 23. Dr Tan is competent, caring & thorough in her diagnosis & treatment plans. Her support staff are very kind & patient in explaining how to use the medication.

I have been a patient for over 10 years. I live in the United States and continue to see Dr. Tan on my trips to Singapore. Dr Tan and her nurses have been instrumental in helping me deal with skin challenges throughout my early 20s and now in my mid-30s. Dr Tan is kind, patient, thorough and a true expert. I fully trust her diagnosis and treatment plans. I have and will continue to recommend her to my friends and family. Dr Tan and her staff have made such a difference in my life!
